mapper.select: select count(*) from board_all where status = 'Y'

select BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, b.ENROLL_DATE, COUNT, b.STATUS, TOP_FIX, NOTICE_RANGE, NOTICE_CATEGOTY, NOTICE_PERIOD, m.member_name from board_all b join member m on(b.board_Writer = m.member_no) where b.status = 'Y' order by board_no desc
mapper.update: update board_all set count = count + 1 where board_no = #{bno} and status = 'Y'
mapper.select: select b.BOARD_NO, b.BOARD_WRITER, BOARD_TYPE, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, b.ENROLL_DATE, COUNT, b.STATUS, TOP_FIX, NOTICE_RANGE, NOTICE_CATEGOTY, NOTICE_PERIOD, m.member_name, file_name, FILE_ORIGIN_NAME, file_path, file_size, a.file_upload_date from board_all b join member m on(b.board_Writer = m.member_no) join attachment a on(b.board_Writer = a.member_no) where b.status = 'Y' and b.board_no = #{boardNo} and a.board_no = #{boardNo} and b.board_Writer = #{boardWriter}
mapper.insert: insert into board_all( board_no, board_writer, board_type, board_title, board_content, enroll_date, count, status, top_fix, notice_range, NOTICE_CATEGOTY, notice_period ) values( seq_bno.nextval, #{boardWriter}, 1, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, sysdate, default, default, default, #{noticeRange}, #{noticeCategory}, #{noticePeriod} )
